radiographic_examinations.findings: Visualized lung fields are within normal limits. No evidence of pleural or pericardial effusion. Multiple right-sided hepatic hypodensities likely representing simple cysts or biliary hamartomas. Normal pancreas, spleen, and adrenal glands. No evidence of focal renal lesions or hydronephrosis. Dilated appendix measuring up to 1.2 cm with wall thickening measuring up to 4 mm and mild associated stranding. Trace free fluid within the pelvis.
